org.trianacode.discovery.protocols.thirdparty

Interface BonjourService


  • public interface BonjourService
    Interface for third party service - whatever is hooked up must be capable of sending and receiving TDP requests and responses (locally) and then translate those into protocol specific interactions.

    User: scmijt Date: Jul 30, 2010 Time: 2:45:01 PM To change this template use File | Settings | File Templates.

      • getServiceName

        java.lang.String getServiceName()
        The service name for the type of Triana discovery protocol service. Services are advertised on the network using the type "_tdp._tcp" and using the service name you advertise for your protocol
        Returns:
